naslov: Sutivan, PRVI RED DO MORA (kamena kuća) / video / čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: - ekskluzivna nekretnina agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. NAPOMENA: detaljni opis, slike i video šaljemo na ozbiljan upit Kamena kuća (duplex) na atraktivnoj lokaciji, prvi red do mora s panoramskim pogledom i direktnim izlazom na plažu. - gradnja 1890.godine / zadnja adaptacija 2002.godine - potrebna adaptacija ................................................ TEHNIČKI OPIS: + okućnica 550m2 (netto cca 400m2) + 240m2 stambeno - SUTEREN / PRIZEMLJE: garaža, tri ostave + pomoćni objekat u dvoru - PRIZEMLJE: 5 prostorija, hodnik, kupatilo - 1.KAT: 5 prostorija, kupatilo, loggia, balkon - potkrovlje ................................................ - više ulaza u objekat i dvor - betonske grede - infrastruktura cijena 1 350 000 eura ENG--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- - exclusive sale of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% of the sales price Dear clients, viewing of the property is only possible with a signed mediation agreement, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on mediation in real estate transactions. NOTE: detailed description, pictures and video are sent upon serious request Stone house (duplex) in an attractive location, first row to the sea with a panoramic sea view and direct access to the beach. - construction in 1890 / last adaptation in 2002 - necessary adaptation ................................................ TECHNICAL DESCRIPTION: + garden plot 550m2 (net approx. 400m2) + 240m2 residential - BASEMENT / GROUND FLOOR: garage, three storage rooms + auxiliary building in the yard - GROUND FLOOR: 5 rooms, hallway, bathroom - 1ST FLOOR: 5 rooms, bathroom, loggia, balcony - attic ................................................ - more entrances to the building and garden - concrete beams - infrastructure price 1,350,000 euros #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
